findings.rationale: An indefinite term for confidentiality may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual obligations, potentially leading to difficulties in compliance and unexpected liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to ambiguity and disputes regarding what constitutes confidential material, increasing the risk of unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.
